segments.text: There must be something weighing on your mind . What is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dad , I lost mum's necklace . I'm afraid she will scold me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don â€™ t worry . I'll buy a new necklace as same as the old one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is so kind of you , Dad .
segments.speaker: S2
